head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths POLLOCK, JOHN LAURENCE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths POLLOCK, JOHN LAURENCE

block.p: POLLOCK-John Laurence. Loving and devoted husband of Mary Maher Pollock, brother of Rita Murphy and uncle of Maryellen Maher and Patricia Maher Wangsness. Visiting hours 2-4 and 7-9 PM Thursday, June 1st Krtil Funeral Home, 1297 1 Ave. Funeral Mass 10 AM, Friday, June 2nd, Our Lady of Peace, 237 E. 62 St.
